subject: Update hooks_config.yaml with setup section
description:
Add setup configuration section to hooks/hooks_config.yaml with:
- env_validation settings (required_tools, required_env_vars, warn_only)
- workspace_init settings (default_template, auto_git_init)
- dependency_check settings (check_vulnerabilities, update_lockfile)
- project_scaffold settings (auto_install_deps, create_git_repo)

All should be disabled by default (manual trigger only).
